author: gmelachr
body:
With this (urgent) PR for the BPHNano package we fix two minor issues (two duplicated lines and a wrong doc in a cfg file) and we also reactive some branches that were accidentaly deactivated during the previous update of the BPHNano package.

These changes will also be backported in CMSSW_15_0_X and CMSSW_15_1_X and if possible we would like to have this update merged at CMSSW_15_0_X as soon as possible in order to proceed with the new release at Tier-0 before the end of the Machine development, which will be completed at Friday 10/10/2025.
title: Update for BPHNano
